text: Leszno () is a city in Greater Poland Voivodeship in western Poland. About 62,000 people live there. Its area is 31.9 km². The mayor of Leszno is Grzegorz Rusiecki. == Twin towns == Leszno is twinned with: * Batouri, Cameroon * Dachau, Germany * Deurne, Netherlands * Montluçon, France * Sankt Pölten, Austria * Sisak, Croatia * Suhl, Germany Category:Cities in Greater Poland Voivodeship
title: Leszno
